[[
## Summary
]]


Sharding is being implemented on Ethereum's mainnet. The current status of sharding implementation was discussed during this meeting.

A new version of the shard proposal has been released, which includes a revised design for the shard data structure and an updated protocol specification.


The team also reviewed the progress made so far in implementing sharding on devnet.
